name: Fill and Cross Trick or Treat
name_original: Fill and Cross Trick or Treat
description:
Trick or treat! Today you have a unique opportunity to remember Halloween night! Are you afraid of ghosts? Can you get a lot of tasty candies faster than your friends?

Guess all the pictures and win many unusual trophies!

120 unique levels in 6 magnificent locations.

More than 4 hours of play time in the most mystery corners of an old spooky farm.

Excellent music, effective trophies and a truly Halloween atmosphere!
Boo!

- The game in the genre of nonograms
- 120 unique levels
- More than 4 hours of gameplay
- Spectacular trophies
- Mystical Halloween game style
